Package camzup.core

Class MaterialUv

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.EntityData
camzup.core.Material
camzup.core.MaterialUv
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntityData, IMaterial, IUtils
Direct Known Subclasses:
MaterialPImage
public abstract class MaterialUv
extends Material
A material which holds data to display textured materials. Holds a transform that may be applied to UV coordinates.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Color tint
    The texture tint.
    Transform2 transform
    The UV coordinate transform.
